mapper.insert: insert into adminqnaboard (num, subject, content, regdate) values ( (select nvl(max(num)+1,1) from adminqnaboard), #{subject}, #{content}, #{regdate})
mapper.select: select num,subject,content,regdate from adminqnaboard order by num desc
mapper.update: update adminqnaboard set subject= #{subject}, content= #{content} where num=#{num}
